title: We're unable to log you in because you may be offline.
body: As the title says, I'm trying to play some good ole league of legends, and this pops up, I found a thread from June or July and attempted the fix in it and nothing happened, I'm also unable to check the server status page and don't seem to be able to find this issue posted anywhere else

replies.body: just fixed it, had to change my dns server and everything is working as intended again

Ayyyy glad you were able to get that up and running again! In the future, try that DNS step as well as the Port Forwarding step in that [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick. They tend to help usually ^_^
